question: How do I add my company to this list?
answer: 1) Make a copy of the last company entry above this and put it right above this entry.
2) Edit the second of those entries and replace with your company information.
3) Be sure to keep or add a jobs_url if your company is recruiting.
4) Create a pull request for this file.
